comment.author: 44573711@N00
comment._content: Given the dates of the Bain photos, this could be the second Columbia built by Mr. J. Harvey Ladew. The first Columbia, built by William Cramp & Sons, was seized by the U.S. Government in 1898 and renamed the U.S.S. Wasp for service during the Spanish American War. The second Columbia caused a bit of a international incident when she put in at the closed port of Wakayama for repairs. [1]<a href="http://query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9F04E4D6143FE633A25756C1A9609C946296D6CF"[2] Journal of the American Society of Naval Engineers, Vol. 11
